PAL.NAME: Microsoft OCS 2007 R2 - Enterprise
PAL.DESCRIPTION: Performance counter thresholds for Microsoft Office Communications Server 2007 R2 Enterprise Edition Server.

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: The number of calls that are currently being handled.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:QMSAgent - 00 - QoEMonitoringServerAgent QMSAgent - 004 - Number of rejected metrics reports

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: This counter represents the number of QoE metrics reports rejected due to an invalid encoding or server processing errors.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:QMSAgent - 00 - QoEMonitoringServerAgent QMSAgent - 014 - Total number of metrics reports rejected by the external report consumer

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: This counter represents the total number of metrics reports that the external report consumer rejected as invalid.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:QMSAgent - 00 - QoEMonitoringServerAgent QMSAgent - 015 - Total number of failures occurred while sending reports to the external report consumer

CHART.DATASOURCE: \LC:QMSAgent - 00 - QoEMonitoringServerAgent\QMSAgent - 015 - Total number of failures occurred while sending reports to the external report consumer

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: This counter represents the total number of failures that occurred while sending reports to the external report consumer since the server was started.

ANALYSIS.NAME: LC:QMSAgent - 00 - QoEMonitoringServerAgent QMSAgent - 016 - Total number of reports that could not be sent to the external report consumer
ANALYSIS.PRIMARYDATASOURCE: \LC:QMSAgent - 00 - QoEMonitoringServerAgent\QMSAgent - 016 - Total number of reports that could not be sent to the external report consumer

CHART.DATASOURCE: \LC:QMSAgent - 00 - QoEMonitoringServerAgent\QMSAgent - 016 - Total number of reports that could not be sent to the external report consumer

ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: This counter represents total number of reports dropped due to exceeding the maximum configured memory storage allowed for reports.
